SELECT book.*,(au_name)as bo_au_name,(tr_name)as bo_tr_name FROM book join authors on bo_num=au_bo_num join translators on bo_num=tr_bo_num where
bo_title like concat('%', #{cri.search}, '%') or bo_publisher like concat('%', #{cri.search}, '%') or au_name like concat('%', #{cri.search}, '%')
bo_title like concat('%', #{cri.search}, '%')
au_name like concat('%', #{cri.search}, '%')
bo_publisher like concat('%', #{cri.search}, '%')
order by case bo_code when "미정" then 1 else 2 end LIMIT #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
